sentences.sentence: Objective to assess the value of endoscopic otologic surgery for recurrent cholesteatoma.
sentences.translation: 目的探讨耳内镜手术在复发胆脂瘤治疗中的应用价值。

sentences.sentence: Objective: to study the effects of otologic drill noise on functions and morphology of the inner ears and investigate into the injury mechanism to the inner ears of guinea pigs.
sentences.translation: 目的：观察耳科电钻噪声对豚鼠内耳功能和形态的影响，并探讨电钻噪声对内耳的损伤机制。
